short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast forward and rewind YouTube ads using your arrow keys!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever wanted to re-watch an ad, or skip it? YouTube Ad Controller lets you fast forward and rewind YouTube video ads with your arrow keys, just like on any video!
